content: Those proportions won't give you great taste and intensity. We highly suggest to add more coffee or water, so you can really enjoy your drink.
This type of coffee might not give you a kick. It's great for meetings with friends and family. Perfect to just enjoy the time.
This is regular coffee. Great for the start of every morning. Perfect for the little boost while working or studying.
This type of coffee is really intense. It's almost like an espresso. Condensed shot gives you the energy for the day.
Espresso type of coffee. Intense taste. Gives a good kick. Not recomended to begginers.
Those proportions may be DANGEROUS for you. DO NOT drink this type of coffee.
